name: Group 13 Level 4&5 - Freedom Grapple
description:
Freedom Grapple is a platforming game where the core mechanic of jumping has been removed and instead has been replaced with a grappling hook that give the character a clear course of movement. 

The controls are as follows:

A&D - Move left and right

Mouse Click - Grapple to nearby surface

L-Ctrl - Crouch

You play as a small robot that is tasked with infiltrating a military base in order to free his mechanical brethren and stop them from being used in an upcoming war.

Group 13 comprises of:

Jayden Murray - Level 5 - Design

Denis Remo - Level 4 - Programming

Tate Morgan - Level 4 - Design

Loucas Savvides - Level 4 - Design
